author: mbandrews
body:
Add noise correlation and difference plots to Noise layouts to aid in detecting "bad" noise: unusual noise patterns show up as uncorrelated (or off-peak) rechits.
- EB near vs far
- EE z- vs z+
- EB far - near
- EE z+ - z-

Modify EB TT numbering to start from true iTT=1 index.
In conjunction with 81X PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/14939
title: Add noise correlation+difference plots
